issue_title: [Bug] CLI does not expose Todo.rename() functionality - todo.py has a rename method bu
summary: Added CLI 'rename' subcommand to expose Todo.rename() functionality to users.

changes.description: Added TodoApp.rename() method, 'rename' subcommand to build_parser(), and rename handler in run_command()
New test file with 5 tests for CLI rename functionality

acceptance_criteria_met: CLI has a 'rename' subcommand that accepts id and new text
rename command calls TodoApp.rename() to update todo text
Error handling for non-existent todo id returns exit code 1
risks_limitations: No special handling for multiline text - follows existing patterns
